title: The Ballad of Lou Witzki (feat. Josh Adam Meyers)
description:
Josh Adam Meyers joins The Bonfire and listens to a beautiful song created by Camper Julian Cary about DJ Lou's ailments. Jay tells the gang about meeting  Fat Joe and having it not go quite like he had imagined. 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@JoshAdamMeyers www.JoshAdamMeyers.com
